it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.controller

Class MatchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.controller.MatchController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class MatchController
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    Controller class of the MVC pattern. Separates Model (Match) from View (UserHandler). Observes all the UserHandlers and is observed by all of them. The controller observes the match, too.
    Author:
    fabri, daniele

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatchController(Match match, UserHandler... handlers)
      Constructs the controller.

      Starts a new match.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MatchController

        public MatchController(Match match,
                       UserHandler... handlers)
        Constructs the controller. The controller adds himself as observer of the match and of all the UserHandlers. Each UserHandler is also registered as observer of the controller. Once the object is created, the match starts.
        Parameters:
        match - the model to observe
        handlers - the UserHandlers the controller will communicate with.

    • Method Detail

      • startMatch

        public void startMatch()
        Starts a new match. This method performs 2 actions: notifies the UserHandlers with the datas of the new match and starts a new round.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable source,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Reacts to notifies from UserHandlers and Match.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
